title: [Enhancement] Passing through ProxyContext for future expansion
description:
Before Creating the Enhancement Request

  • I have confirmed that this should be classified as an enhancement rather than a bug/feature.

Summary

Passing through ProxyContext for future expansion.

Motivation

We have ProxyContext to pass some context information, but this context information is not passed to some classes like MetadataService.

Describe the Solution You'd Like

None.

Describe Alternatives You've Considered

None.

Additional Context

No response
